overview: Embark on a journey through 5 high definition fantasies with a masseuse, house wife, babysitters and more! Kennedy Leigh, Kendra Lust, Holly Michaels, Natalia Starr, Natalie Heart, and Chloe Foster are ready to make your fantasy a reality as they take pure passionate sexuality to the next level. All of your sexual fantasies are about to come true!
title: Fantasies Come True 3
